<div type="collation" xml:id="Unit_C17">
<seg xml:id="C17_app1-fMS_start"/> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C17"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.07" unit="tei:head"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__1"/> <seg xml:id="C17_app1-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app2-fMS_start"/> Vol. II <lb n="c57-0002__main__2"/>Chap I <seg xml:id="C17_app2-fMS_end"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0002.07"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C17_app6-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__3"/>"It <seg xml:id="C17_app6-fMS_end"/> is with difficulty that I remember <lb n="c57-0002__main__4"/>the <seg xml:id="C17_app11-fMS_start"/> æra <seg xml:id="C17_app11-fMS_end"/> of my <seg xml:id="C17_app13-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e35">cr</del> being. <seg xml:id="C17_app13-fMS_end"/> All the events of <lb n="c57-0002__main__5"/>that period appear confused & indistinct. <seg xml:id="C17_app15-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e42">I know only that I felt a strang<unclear>e</unclear> </del> A strange <seg xml:id="C17_app15-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app16-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__7"/>sensation <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e50">sea</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app16-fMS_end"/> seized <seg xml:id="C17_app18-fMS_start"/> me <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e53">and a it appeared</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app18-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__8"/>I saw, <seg xml:id="C17_app20-fMS_start"/> felt heard <seg xml:id="C17_app20-fMS_end"/> and <seg xml:id="C17_app22-fMS_start"/> smelt <seg xml:id="C17_app22-fMS_end"/> at the same <seg xml:id="C17_app24-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__9"/>time <seg xml:id="C17_app24-fMS_end"/> and it <seg xml:id="C17_app26-fMS_start"/> was indeed <seg xml:id="C17_app26-fMS_end"/> a long time <w ana="start"/>be<lb n="c57-0002__main__10"/>fore<w ana="end"/> I learned to distinguish between the <seg xml:id="C17_app28-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__11"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0002.01"/><lb n="c57-0002__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__left_margin__d4e75"> <sga-add sID="c57-0002__left_margin__d4e77"/>various <sga-add eID="c57-0002__left_margin__d4e77"/> </del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e81"> <retrace cause="unclear"> </retrace> </del> operations of my various senses. By <seg xml:id="C17_app28-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app29-fMS_start"/> degrees <seg xml:id="C17_app29-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__12"/>I <seg xml:id="C17_app31-fMS_start"/> remember <seg xml:id="C17_app31-fMS_end"/> a stronger light pressed upon <lb n="c57-0002__main__13"/>my <seg xml:id="C17_app33-fMS_start"/> nerves <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e94">and</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app33-fMS_end"/> so that I was obliged to <seg xml:id="C17_app35-fMS_start"/> close <seg xml:id="C17_app35-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__14"/>my eyes. Darkness then came over <seg xml:id="C17_app37-fMS_start"/> me <seg xml:id="C17_app37-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__15"/>and troubled <seg xml:id="C17_app39-fMS_start"/> me.– <seg xml:id="C17_app39-fMS_end"/> But hardly had I felt <seg xml:id="C17_app43-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__16"/>this when (by <seg xml:id="C17_app43-fMS_end"/> opening my <seg xml:id="C17_app45-fMS_start"/> eyes <seg xml:id="C17_app45-fMS_end"/> as I now <seg xml:id="C17_app47-fMS_start"/> suppose) <seg xml:id="C17_app47-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__17"/>the light poured in upon me <seg xml:id="C17_app49-fMS_start"/> again– <seg xml:id="C17_app49-fMS_end"/> I <seg xml:id="C17_app51-fMS_start"/> walked <lb n="c57-0002__main__18"/>and <seg xml:id="C17_app51-fMS_end"/> I <seg xml:id="C17_app53-fMS_start"/> believe <seg xml:id="C17_app53-fMS_end"/> descended; but <seg xml:id="C17_app55-fMS_start"/> presently I <seg xml:id="C17_app55-fMS_end"/> found <lb n="c57-0002__main__19"/>a great <seg xml:id="C17_app58-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e110"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e112">difference</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e115"/>alteration <seg xml:id="C17_app58-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e115"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e110"/>in my <seg xml:id="C17_app60-fMS_start"/> sensations; before <seg xml:id="C17_app60-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__20"/>dark opaque bodies had surrounded me<sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e121"/>, <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e121"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__21"/>impervious to my touch or <seg xml:id="C17_app64-fMS_start"/> sight – and <seg xml:id="C17_app64-fMS_end"/> I <lb n="c57-0002__main__22"/>now found that I could wander on at <seg xml:id="C17_app66-fMS_start"/> liberty <seg xml:id="C17_app66-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__23"/>with no obstacles which I could not either <lb n="c57-0002__main__24"/>surmount or <seg xml:id="C17_app68-fMS_start"/> avoid– <seg xml:id="C17_app68-fMS_end"/> The light <seg xml:id="C17_app70-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e133">be</del> became <seg xml:id="C17_app70-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app71-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e136"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e138"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e138"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e144"/>more <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e144"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e136"/>&<lb n="c57-0002__main__25"/> more <seg xml:id="C17_app71-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app72-fMS_start"/> opressive <seg xml:id="C17_app72-fMS_end"/> to <seg xml:id="C17_app74-fMS_start"/> me and <seg xml:id="C17_app74-fMS_end"/> the heat wearying <lb n="c57-0002__main__26"/>me as I <seg xml:id="C17_app76-fMS_start"/> walked <seg xml:id="C17_app76-fMS_end"/> I sought a place where I could <seg xml:id="C17_app78-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__27"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.04" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.02"/> perceive <anchor xml:id="c57-0002.04"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.03"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e162"/>recieve <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e162"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0002.05"/> <seg xml:id="C17_app78-fMS_end"/> shade. This was the forest near <seg xml:id="C17_app80-fMS_start"/> Ingolstadt,<lb n="c57-0002__main__28"/>and <seg xml:id="C17_app80-fMS_end"/> here by the side of a brook <seg xml:id="C17_app84-fMS_start"/> I lay <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e171">weary</del> <lb n="c57-0002__main__29"/>for some hours <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e177"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e179"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e179"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e185"/>resting from my <seg xml:id="C17_app84-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app85-fMS_start"/> fatigue <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e185"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e177"/> untill <seg xml:id="C17_app85-fMS_end"/> I felt tormented by <lb n="c57-0002__main__30"/>hunger and thirst. This roused me from my nearly <lb n="c57-0003__main__1"/>dormant <seg xml:id="C17_app87-fMS_start"/> state <seg xml:id="C17_app87-fMS_end"/> and I ate some berries <lb n="c57-0003__main__2"/>which I found <seg xml:id="C17_app89-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e203"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e205"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e205"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e211"/>hanging <seg xml:id="C17_app89-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e211"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e203"/>on the <seg xml:id="C17_app91-fMS_start"/> trees <seg xml:id="C17_app91-fMS_end"/> or lying on <lb n="c57-0003__main__3"/>the <seg xml:id="C17_app93-fMS_start"/> ground – <seg xml:id="C17_app93-fMS_end"/> I slaked my thirst <seg xml:id="C17_app95-fMS_start"/> by <seg xml:id="C17_app95-fMS_end"/> the <seg xml:id="C17_app97-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__4"/>brook <seg xml:id="C17_app97-fMS_end"/> and then <seg xml:id="C17_app99-fMS_start"/> again lying <seg xml:id="C17_app99-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app100-fMS_start"/> down I <seg xml:id="C17_app100-fMS_end"/> was <lb n="c57-0003__main__5"/>overcome by <seg xml:id="C17_app102-fMS_start"/> sleep <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e222"/> <mdel>–</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e226"/>; <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e226"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e222"/> It <seg xml:id="C17_app102-fMS_end"/> was dark when I <seg xml:id="C17_app104-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__6"/>awoke, <seg xml:id="C17_app104-fMS_end"/> I felt cold <seg xml:id="C17_app106-fMS_start"/> also <seg xml:id="C17_app106-fMS_end"/> and <seg xml:id="C17_app108-fMS_start"/> half frightened <lb n="c57-0003__main__7"/><mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e234"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e236"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg xml:id="C17_app108-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e236"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e242"/>as it were <seg xml:id="C17_app110-fMS_start"/> instinctively <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e242"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e234"/> on <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e246">seein</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app110-fMS_end"/> finding myself so desolate. <lb n="c57-0003__main__8"/>Before I had quitted you<sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e252"/>r <seg xml:id="C17_app112-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e252"/> appartment <seg xml:id="C17_app112-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__9"/>on a sensation of <seg xml:id="C17_app114-fMS_start"/> cold <seg xml:id="C17_app114-fMS_end"/> I had covered <seg xml:id="C17_app116-fMS_start"/> my<lb n="c57-0003__main__10"/>self <seg xml:id="C17_app116-fMS_end"/> with some <seg xml:id="C17_app118-fMS_start"/> clothes, <seg xml:id="C17_app118-fMS_end"/> but these were <seg xml:id="C17_app120-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__11"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e261">not</del> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e265"/>in <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e265"/>sufficient <seg xml:id="C17_app120-fMS_end"/> to secure me from the <seg xml:id="C17_app122-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__12"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e270">dw</del> dews of night. I was a <seg xml:id="C17_app122-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app123-fMS_start"/> poor helpless <seg xml:id="C17_app123-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__13"/>miserable <seg xml:id="C17_app125-fMS_start"/> wretch—I knew <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e275">no</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app125-fMS_end"/> & could <seg xml:id="C17_app127-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__14"/>distinguish <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e281">no</del> nothing <seg xml:id="C17_app127-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app128-fMS_start"/> but <seg xml:id="C17_app128-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app129-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e284"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e286">felt</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e289"/> <metamark>^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e289"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e294"/>feeling <seg xml:id="C17_app129-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e294"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e284"/>pain <lb n="c57-0003__main__15"/>invade me on all <seg xml:id="C17_app131-fMS_start"/> sides <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e300">and</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app131-fMS_end"/> I sat down <lb n="c57-0003__main__16"/>and wept. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C17_app133-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__17"/>Soon <seg xml:id="C17_app133-fMS_end"/> a gentle light stole over the <seg xml:id="C17_app135-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__18"/>heavens <seg xml:id="C17_app135-fMS_end"/> and gave me a sensation of <seg xml:id="C17_app137-fMS_start"/> pleasure <seg xml:id="C17_app137-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__19"/>I started up, and beheld a radiant form <lb n="c57-0003__main__20"/>rise <seg xml:id="C17_app139-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e316">am</del> from among the trees. <seg xml:id="C17_app139-fMS_end"/> I gazed with <lb n="c57-0003__main__21"/>a kind of <seg xml:id="C17_app142-fMS_start"/> wonder – <seg xml:id="C17_app142-fMS_end"/> It moved <seg xml:id="C17_app144-fMS_start"/> slowly; <seg xml:id="C17_app144-fMS_end"/> but <lb n="c57-0003__main__22"/>it enlightened my <seg xml:id="C17_app146-fMS_start"/> path, <seg xml:id="C17_app146-fMS_end"/> and I again <lb n="c57-0003__main__23"/>went out in search of berries. I was still <seg xml:id="C17_app148-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__24"/>cold <seg xml:id="C17_app148-fMS_end"/> when <seg xml:id="C17_app150-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e328">on the ground</del> under one of the <lb n="c57-0003__main__25"/>trees I found a huge <seg xml:id="C17_app150-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app151-fMS_start"/> cloak <seg xml:id="C17_app151-fMS_end"/> with which <seg xml:id="C17_app153-fMS_start"/> I– <seg xml:id="C17_app153-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__26"/>covered myself, and sat down <seg xml:id="C17_app155-fMS_start"/> on <seg xml:id="C17_app155-fMS_end"/> the ground. <lb n="c57-0003__main__27"/>No distinct ideas occupied my <seg xml:id="C17_app157-fMS_start"/> mind <seg xml:id="C17_app157-fMS_end"/> all was <seg xml:id="C17_app159-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__28"/>confused <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e340">and</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app159-fMS_end"/> I felt <seg xml:id="C17_app161-fMS_start"/> the light, and <seg xml:id="C17_app161-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app162-fMS_start"/> hunger <seg xml:id="C17_app162-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__29"/>and <seg xml:id="C17_app164-fMS_start"/> thirst <seg xml:id="C17_app164-fMS_end"/> and darkness; innumerable <lb n="c57-0003__main__30"/>sounds rung in my <seg xml:id="C17_app166-fMS_start"/> ears <seg xml:id="C17_app166-fMS_end"/> and on all sides <lb n="c57-0003__main__31"/>various scents saluted <seg xml:id="C17_app168-fMS_start"/> me; <seg xml:id="C17_app168-fMS_end"/> the only object <lb n="c57-0003__main__32"/>that I could distinguish was the bright<lb n="c57-0004__main__1"/> <seg xml:id="C17_app170-fMS_start"/> moon <seg xml:id="C17_app170-fMS_end"/> and <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e363"/>I <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e363"/>fixed my eyes <seg xml:id="C17_app173-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e366"/> <mdel>i</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e370"/>o <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e370"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e366"/> n <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e374">th</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app173-fMS_end"/> that with <lb n="c57-0004__main__2"/>pleasure. <seg xml:id="C17_app175-fMS_start"/> Several <seg xml:id="C17_app175-fMS_end"/> changes of day and night <seg xml:id="C17_app177-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0004__main__3"/>passed <seg xml:id="C17_app177-fMS_end"/> and the orb of night had greatly <seg xml:id="C17_app179-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0004__main__4"/>lessened <seg xml:id="C17_app179-fMS_end"/> when I began to distinguish my <lb n="c57-0004__main__5"/>sensations <seg xml:id="C17_app181-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e386"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e388"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e388"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e394"/>from each <seg xml:id="C17_app181-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app182-fMS_start"/> other– <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e394"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e386"/> . <seg xml:id="C17_app182-fMS_end"/> I <seg xml:id="C17_app184-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e398"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e400">first saw</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e403"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e405">dis</del> gradually saw plainly <seg xml:id="C17_app184-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e403"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e398"/>the clear stream <lb n="c57-0004__main__6"/>that supplied me with <seg xml:id="C17_app186-fMS_start"/> drink <seg xml:id="C17_app186-fMS_end"/> and the <seg xml:id="C17_app188-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e413"> <unclear>gre</unclear> </del> <lb n="c57-0004__main__7"/>trees that <seg xml:id="C17_app188-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C17_app189-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e420"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e422">covered</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e425"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e425"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e431"/>shaded <seg xml:id="C17_app189-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e431"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e420"/>me with their foliage. <lb n="c57-0004__main__8"/>I was delighted when I first discovered <lb n="c57-0004__main__9"/>that a pleasant <seg xml:id="C17_app191-fMS_start"/> sound <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e439"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e441">that</del> <seg xml:id="C17_app191-fMS_end"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e444"/>which <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e444"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e439"/>often <seg xml:id="C17_app194-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0004__main__10"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e451">delighte</del> saluted my <seg xml:id="C17_app194-fMS_end"/>
